queryMap:
SPARQL '''PREFIX wdt: <http://www.wikidata.org/prop/direct/>
PREFIX wd: <http://www.wikidata.org/entity/>

SELECT ?item WHERE {?item wdt:P31 wd:Q15079786 ; wdt:P272 wd:Q2881259 .} LIMIT 10'''@START

SPARQL '''PREFIX wdt: <http://www.wikidata.org/prop/direct/>
PREFIX wd: <http://www.wikidata.org/entity/>

SELECT ?item WHERE {?item wdt:P31 wd:Q15079786 ; wdt:P272 wd:Q2881259 .} LIMIT 100'''@START

dataLabel: Get all ballet performances software items from Wikidata
queryMap:
SPARQL '''PREFIX wdt: <http://www.wikidata.org/prop/direct/>
PREFIX wd: <http://www.wikidata.org/entity/>

SELECT ?item WHERE {?item wdt:P31 wd:Q15079786 ; wdt:P272 wd:Q2881259 .}'''@START
